review: When this game first came out it felt like a waste of money and had little content, but after thousands of updates and improvments this game is acutally worth every $! if your looking for a fun coop game with dinos! then this is a must buy :D

Thought this game would be a good laugh instead it made me cry :'(.....................With its super emotional and in-depth story. ive never seen a game so amazing! the voice acting is great, i give this game 6/4 very good
